abstract: Consumer Reports offers recommendations on how to react if a car accelerates out of control.
snippet: Consumer Reports offers recommendations on how to react if a car accelerates out of control.
lead_paragraph: As Toyota deals with a recall and a sales moratorium on eight of its American models, drivers may be wondering what action they should take if they find themselves in a car that accelerates out of control.

headline.main: How to Regain Control of an Accelerating Vehicle

abstract: Toyota said there would be “rapid deployment” of a remedy but did not say specifically when or how it would fix the gas pedal problems.
snippet: Toyota said there would be “rapid deployment” of a remedy but did not say specifically when or how it would fix the gas pedal problems.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — The president of Toyota issued his first apology Friday as his troubled automaker expanded its recall to include Europe and it rushed to complete its strategy to modify or replace millions of accelerator pedals.

headline.main: With Recall Expanding, Toyota Gives an Apology
headline.print_headline: With Recall Expanding, Toyota Gives An Apology

byline.original: By Nick Bunkley and Micheline Maynard
